def_en: You use at least to say that a number or amount is the smallest that is possible or likely and that the actual number or amount may be greater. The forms at the least and at the very least are also used.

def_cn: （表示真实性或可能性）至少，最不济
def_en: You use at least to say that something is the minimum that is true or possible. The forms at the least and at the very least are also used.

def_cn: （表示相对于不利条件或糟糕情形）起码，不管怎样
def_en: You use at least to indicate an advantage that exists in spite of the disadvantage or bad situation that has just been mentioned.

def_cn: （表示更正或改变自己刚说过的话）至少，起码
def_en: You use at least to indicate that you are correcting or changing something that you have just said.
You use the least to mean a smaller amount than anyone or anything else, or the smallest amount possible.
You use least to indicate that someone or something has less of a particular quality than most other things of its kind.
You use the least to emphasize the smallness of something, especially when it hardly exists at all.
You use least to indicate that something is true or happens to a smaller degree or extent than anything else or at any other time.

def_cn: 无足轻重的；微乎其微的
def_en: You use least in structures where you are emphasizing that a particular situation or event is much less important or serious than other possible or actual ones.

def_cn: （应该做的）最少量，最低程度
def_en: You use the least in structures where you are stating the minimum that should be done in a situation, and suggesting that more should really be done.
You can use in the least and the least bit to emphasize a negative.

def_cn: 最后不能不提；最后但同样重要的是
def_en: You use last but not least to say that the last person or thing to be mentioned is as important as all the others.

def_cn: （用于否定句后）（多者之中）尤其，尤数
def_en: You can use least of all after a negative statement to emphasize that it applies especially to the person or thing mentioned.

def_cn: （强调某一例证或原因）尤其是，特别是，相当重要地
def_en: You can use not least to emphasize a particularly important example or reason.

def_cn: 轻则；往轻里说；客气点说
def_en: You can use to say the least to suggest that a situation is actually much more extreme or serious than you say it is.
